Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its innovative features and unparalleled performance, this product is truly a game-changer in its field. I believe it could be an invaluable asset for you, potentially saving you time, effort, and boosting your productivity. Considering its exceptional quality and benefits, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it for $12000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value it brings to you. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
